div.p: The official URL for this operation definition is:

The bulk submit-data operation sends a bulk import request based on the data requirements of a FHIR Measure. This operation is modeled off the existing draft of the Bulk Data Import Ping and Pull Approach.
The absolute URL of the bulk export endpoint of a Data Provider
(Optional) Restrict the data exported to only be specific FHIR resource types. See the bulk data $export spec for more information on '_type'

(Optional) If enabled, data exported by the 'exportUrl' system will be filtered according to the data requirements of the Measure. Requires support of the _typeFilter expiremental parameter in the export server. See the bulk data $export spec for more information on '_typeFilter'
